text: Given the size of web2py and the lack of resources and corporate support, do you think it would be advisable to learn web2py as the only web development frame work I know.
I'm considersing learning ror or web2py for a website i need to create for as a school project.
this is not the 'ruby vs python' question.
I just want to know what disadvantages i would face if i selected a frame work other that the main stream ror or django(if any).
